___agent_endpoint_port.description: Instana SaaS/on-prem monitoring endpoint port (SaaS port: 443 - on-prem default port: 1444).

___instances.description: Number of Instana Agent instances to run.

___agent_endpoint.description: Instana-SaaS endpoint URL or on-prem backend hostname.

___ram.description: Number of memory shares assigned to the Instana agent.

___tag_list.description: Comma separated list of host-specific tags which identify the Mesos node.

___cpus.description: Number of CPU shares assigned to the Instana agent.
